"You no longer need those fancy clothes," the woman said to Katie.

"I'd rather keep them on if it's all the same to you," Katie replied.

"As you wish," the woman said, withdrew her hands, and looked Katie up and down, "although how much longer you'll be able to do so is debatable."

"Huh," Katie said, baffled, what are you-"

"Let me show you," the woman said, and waved her hand. Katie whirled as the scene behind her changed from blackness to a grass hut, well it looked sort of what a grass hut would have looked like anyway, had it been enlarged to the size of a football stadium. There was a table around the outside, and sitting so close they were almost touching were a row of women almost the same size as this 'fertility'. in the centre were a group of people, both men and women, cooking, while another group were constantly ferrying loaded plates of food to the table and taking away the empty ones to be refilled

Suddenly, realisation dawned, "you make women fat," Katie said "you're going to make me fat."

"What greater show of fertility is there than a woman with a wealth of sustenance," the woman said, and waved her hand towards the nearest bench, where an empty space had appeared, "now, sit, and partake of fertility."

"B-but I don't want-" Katie began

"You have no choice," the woman said suddenly grabbing Katie's wrist in her iron-firm grip and leading her over to the bench, where her other hand, placed on the young archaeologist’s shoulder, forced her into the high-backed, but armless seat, then released her wrist and waved at the plate of food, "now, eat."

Glancing at the plate, piled high with succulent fruits and rich meats, Katie had finally had enough, and so swung at the woman, although it didn't connect, as the woman moved like a snake, grabbing her wrist, and effortlessly bringing it around behind the back of the seat where she tied it, immobile, "I will brook no disobedience young lady, now are you going to behave, or will I have to feed you like a baby."

"Do your worst," Katie muttered.

"Indeed I will," the woman said, and grabbed Katie's other wrist and repeating the process, before reaching out for a large plump fruit the archaeologist couldn't identify, "open wide." Instead, though, she was met by clenched teeth and tight lips. "you know," she sighed, "I had thought you'd start co-operating, it's in your best interests to." When this didn't have any outward effect on the defiant young woman, she frowned, and said, "you leave me no choice then."

Suddenly, Katie was bent double as the woman rammed her plump fist into the archaeologist’s gut, and then before she could begin to recover, had something between her teeth and her head back leading back against the chair, "'at are you going to do?"

"Since you refuse to eat yourself," the woman said, almost pleasantly, but with a stern look on her face, "I'm going to have to make sure you get enough to eat." Picking up the fruit again, she held it, two-handed, just over Katie's mouth, and squeezed. Katie almost drowned in that first rush of juice, but managed to drink most of it, just before the pulped remains of the fruit landed in her mouth. The next thing the woman dropped into Katie's mouth was a strip of meat that fertility cut into chunks with only her thumb-nail, and after that - by now the archaeologist was beginning to zone out - a large handful of sardine-like fish, one at a time.

-------

Katie shifted uncomfortably, her belt was cutting in under her overfull stomach - which unbeknownst to her wasn't full in the slightest, but which had become a large fleshy belly - and her bra too, strangely. The woman seemed to understand her discomfort, for she turned away from the food, and carefully undid all of the button's on Katie's jacket, reached in behind her back and undid the clip on her bra, bringing blessed relief as her now much fuller breasts surged forward, before moving on to her belt, chubby but, finger probing deeply in under the archaeologist’s still comparatively small belly roll. After that came the ties on her wrists, and whatever it was pinning her head back to the seat.

Now finally free, Katie brought her hand forward, working over herself, examining her new, expanded form. She didn't have much time to examine it properly though, as the woman bent down beside and said, "stand up." There was barely a moment's hesitation now, barely a twinkle in her eye to disagree with Fertility. The moment the once-archaeologist, now glutton had stood up, Fertility began to remove her clothing, starting with her jacket, then her t-shirt and finally her bra, before starting on her lower garments. When it was over, Fertility sat Katie down again, and said, "now, eat." Again, there was barely a moment's hesitation, before the thinner - but still fat - woman began digging into the pile of food before her, a pile which had not reduced in the slightest, and in fact may well have grown.

In the back of her mind, Katie kept abreast of the changes while her body ate, her belly pushing out further and further, taking up more and more of her lap, her love handles spreading out sideways, only prevented from drooping over her thighs by the fact that they too were expanding, as was her behind, pushing her gradually further and further up off the seat. Also, her breasts, arms and even face were expanding, filling out under the constant intake of food...

-------

Katie drew her fingers down her face, she'd known dreams were weird, but that was one of the strangest she'd ever had. Still, she thought, as her stomach made its presence known again, no point in dwelling on a dream, and so she threw her bedclothes off and...
1322212.title: Portentous Dream

13222122.content:
...Stared in shock at her body, now much changed from when she'd gone to sleep, gone were the pert, tight breasts, replaced by things the size of rock-melons, while her gut, once flat, was now beginning to flow down her legs. There were other growths as well, hips thighs, love handles...everything about her was huge now, even her fingers looked like sausages. Still in a state of shock, she struggled get to her feet, utterly unused to her new weight, and in ignorance of how to handle it. Eventually she managed to sit up, although this didn't help much, as it only confirmed in greater detail her extreme corpulence, her belly for example, now filled her lap - or as much of a lap as she had these days, since it weight was pushing her legs apart - to within a couple of inches of her knees, while her backside raised her several inches higher than she'd once sat.

Things didn't get any easier for Katie once she was on her feet either, with her immense weight, her centre-of-balance was completely different, and it took her some time to get used to it, while all the while her stomach gurgled loudly. Groaning, and rubbing as much of her stomach as she could reach through her pendulous gut, she waddled slowly towards the kitchen, not even noticing that the house was now subtly different, a little more accommodating to her current size. Also going unnoticed for the time being were photos of pivotal moments in her life, now different, oh not so much in her early ones, though the young girl in them was now chubbier, but in her later ones, the difference was marked, where she had once been shot in uniformed glory for winning some cheer-leading prize or other, she was now in celebrating her academic achievements, top of her class in music, in cooking, in maths. The final pictures was perhaps the most markedly different, previously they had shown a progression of her through university, from earning a scholarship to her, in academic robes, holding a BBus, it was now of a chubbier - though still stick-like compared to what she was now - her, first holding a winning lotteries ticket, followed by some holiday snaps from Hawaii, and finally as she worked her way halfway through a BA, and through about a dozen dress sizes.

Suddenly, at the end of the hallway, Katie found herself confronted, not by, as she'd thought, the kitchen door, but by a staircase fitted with a stair-lift, though this was not a normal one, the near arm was gone, and the seat was extra wide and swivelled. The revelation of this, that she was now too large to even climb stairs, at least with any ease, set her panicking, though there was little she could do as her body, moving of its own volition seated itself in the lift and hit the down button. The ride was slow, which allowed the once slender woman to calm down and contemplate somewhat her new reality, though it didn't help much, as her panic just turned into a sort of morose amazement.

Once she made it to the kitchen, Katie almost panicked once again, watching her body pull out a bowl, then put it back again, before going for the fridge for the remnants of yesterday's pizza, only now there weren't just two slices, there were ten, overlapped sloppily, and a folded up pizza-box in the rubbish. a quick rearrangement on a plate, and a zap in the microwave, and her body managed to scoff down 5 slices of pizza. It then stored the rest, and head for the bathroom, where she noticed with mounting alarm, the handrails by the toilet and the once bath with a showerhead and curtain that was now a bath, a modified spa as it turned out, with a set of fold-down steps. Suddenly her view was obscured as her arms, moving of their own volition, began to remove her night-dress...wait, night-dress? Hadn't she gone to be wearing pyjamas? Still, no use in fighting it she supposed, her body seemed to know what it was doing, even if she herself didn't.

Bathing took a lot longer than Katie was used to, although she supposed it was only natural - if she could call her new body natural - given the number of nooks and crannies she had to wash now. Finally it was over though, and so her body got out of the bath and picked up a bathrobe, a big one, and wrapped and tied it around itself, before hanging a towel off the still exposed bits. Inside, the young woman was almost weeping, this bathrobe was absolutely huge, and yet it wasn't even completely covering her. The view in the mirror came as even more of a shock, instead of smooth hair hanging below her shoulders, she now had scruffy hair so short it barely covered her ears, though this was a peripheral concern compared to her face, which, now far from the slender beauty it had been, had chipmunk cheeks wider than her temples and a globular second chin.

After that, it was over to the scales, which Katie noticed with horror, were big medical ones with the readout on a pole. Even more horrifying was the readout when she stood on them, the display whizzed past 200lb, and then past 300, and began to slow around 350, before coming to a stop on an incredible 387 lb. As she stared in shock at the numbers though, her mouth said, "not bad, only 5 pounds so far this month."

Five pounds this month, Katie screamed silently, but it was only the twelfth, if just under two pounds a day 'wasn't bad'... Meanwhile, the body had started drying itself off, a process that took almost as long as washing, due once again to all the nooks and crannies the rolls created. Once dry, Katie's body went to select clothes for the day, selecting a light-blue, mid sleeved dress that looked big enough to have been made out of a bed sheet. Not that selecting what to wear was the hardest part of getting dressed, no, it was far harder to get in, and despite only wearing three basic articles, it still took over ten minutes, less than a minute of which was putting the dress itself on.

Finally, Katie was left really in control of her own body for the first time that morning. After sitting there for a few minutes, trying to digest what had gone on, she...
13222122.title: A Dream Come True

132221222.content:
...Finally decided to take a look around, and catalogue, in her mind at least, every last change. The first change Katie noticed was the bed, gone was the simply adorned twin she'd slept on for several years now, to be replaced by a plushly adorned queen. Next was the mirror, which she hadn't spotted until now, it had once been a narrow thing, no more than a foot wide and about three-and-a-half feet high, it was now at least three, maybe four feet wide, and looked over four feet high, edged in floridly carved, silver-painted plaster, rather than plain wood. The room itself was much larger as well, previously her queen-sized bed would have left hardly an inch spare down the size, but now the room was more than wide enough to fit another queen by its side. Her wardrobe was also bigger, and an inbuilt one rather than an old, scratched-up standalone.

Standing up Katie waddled her way out into the hall and into the bathroom for no other reason than it was across from her bedroom door. This room was also much larger now, and lighter due to a sun-tube in the ceiling. The floor, formerly cheap linoleum, lifting around the edges, was now slip-resistant tiling while the walls had gone from painted drywall to floral-patterned glazed tiles. There was a shelf unit in the corner with towels on it, though like everything else, it was larger and more sumptuous. That seemed to be all, then she saw up on the wall the TV, a large one, and wondered why it was there opposite the tub, before moving over to investigate, and being surprised, and then slightly disgusted to find a control panel embedded in the side of the tub, evidently the new her was much richer than the old her, and a lot more lazy.

Leaving the Bathroom behind, she explored the rest of the upstairs as best she could, which consisted of another two bedrooms - each as large as sumptuous, though more spartan, than her own - and a separate washroom. She explored each in minor detail, not so much out of interest as out of disdain for having to use the stair-lift. Finally though, she could put it off no longer, and began to move towards the stairs, almost ignoring the pictures on the wall, before realising they were their, and stopping to look at them. Each picture she looked at brought a flood of memories with it, overlaying, but not, for now at least, overwriting her 'true' memories. The 'new' her proved to be different indeed, oh the same more-or-less in childhood, but diverging wildly as she hit high school.

The new her was more academic, less athletic; more taken with emotion than appearance; more artistic, less efficient. The older she got, the more the two hers diverged. In reality, check, in her old reality, she'd managed, by dint of much effort to win a scholarship, which had seen her enter college and study, whereas the new her had been content to drift along, getting a job at a local cafe, and earning herself a respectable if not brilliant wage, and that's where she might have stayed, if she hadn't won big on the lottery, netting the extremely tidy sum of five million, four fifths of which she'd immediately stuck in the bank before trying to find ways of spending the last million. The first being a year's world travel, which had broadened both her horizons and her waistline, she'd never been good at minding her weight, and a year of luxury had cost her, as she went from merely a touch chubby to undeniably fat, or to put it mathematically from 142 pounds to 175.

The journey had also sparked Katie's wish to be an artist and under that desire she'd joined a university in search of a BA, but had kicked it before she finished, she'd had few friends due to her size - which over the year-and-a-half she was there had risen to over 250 pounds - and the degree hadn't been as interesting as she'd hoped, though it had given her a good grounding, which she'd used in setting up herself up as a freelance artist. She'd also, soon after, brought the house, using the rest of her 'spending million' and a bit of the 'bank millions'. Now she was made for life, she'd money enough to live on, and plenty besides, and was even able to afford a cleaner, June, to come around twice a week.

In fact today was one of those days, so Katie straightened up, and made her way over to the stairs, and while she knew she would probably need to use the lift most of the time, today she decided to get down the stairs on her own, a process made much harder - she realised to her dismay only after she'd triggered the lift to descend ahead of her - by the fact that the stairs now had no hand-rail, remembering belatedly that she'd had it removed after she'd had the lift installed. Nevertheless, she was determined no get down on her own, and so, with one hand against the wall, she started to descend. The journey to the bottom was painfully slow, much slower than the lift would have been, but also strangely rewarding.

Once she was down, Katie thought about further exploring the house, but decided against it...
132221222.title: Finding A New Life

14.title: The Classic

15.content:
The other section's were - for whatever reason - not quite a perfect match. That's alright, I'm not here to try to constrain your muse. I only expect quality, no matter the subject.

Tall Tails: Dogs are great, and big dogs are even better, and that's what this story is about, dogs that really redefine what we think of as "big dogs". Towering dogs with huge waistlines as well as some dogs that are just plain gargantuan are what you'll find here. Pick a dog and explore the life of one of these towering canines.

There are currently 4 open slots available for stories. Please e-mail me your summary and title to edit your heading here.
15.title: The Odd-File

151.content:
Cosmic Creations: What do you get when the ozone layer opens up and lets a few cosmic rays into a small spot in a forest? A lot of dead things. But that’s not the case for one particular German Shepherd; instead, it would change her in incredible ways. A year after the rays touched down, she now stands an amazing seven feet at the withers, solidly built with a strong frame and plenty of muscle to back it up. Her mind also functions at unimaginable levels, nearly matching a human’s processing ability, coupled with her preexisting canine brain, which has been sharpened by leaps and bounds as well.

Enter Paul Martell. Age Twenty-three. A recent college graduate with a stable job, a new place to live, and more time than he knows what to do with. An architect by trade and an artist by heart, he’s quite often seen at his drawing table, but that’s not to say he doesn’t get out. He’s a very active individual, constantly going on runs, walks, hikes, bike rides, river trips, and pretty much anything else that lets him burn off some energy. He’s always liked dogs, and plans on getting one as soon as he’s settled in his new home, but he’ll be getting one sooner than he anticipated.



Lady's Luck: Perpetually Hungry: DNA is determines everything in our bodies, and when something isn’t right, it’s usually pretty noticeable. As is the case with a particularly large Springer Spaniel who’s been growing up and out for as long as she can remember, because she’s got a serious problem with food. Standing almost six feet at the shoulder, this hefty canine is pushing nearly three tons in weight, an awesome number that keeps climbing as her endless hunger drives her to continually search for new food sources in the large city where she currently resides in the shadows of the night, and elsewhere in the day to hide her huge frame. Only surviving off what she can scrounge has her gains slowed to a crawl, but if she finds a stable food source that will all change very quickly.

Enter Jack Weston. Age Thirty-six. A senior wildlife biologist at Eastern State University, living just outside the city on a sizeable patch of land in a modest home. Much of his time at the University is spent researching in his and other related fields, and teaching others with the same ambitions. A master of biology, but also a man with a knack for building things, Jack is always busy at home fixing or building something in his garage, but enjoys getting out for bike rides and walks too. He grew up around dogs and has always had them in his life, up until recently when his last dog passed away, but lucky for him, he’ll have a new friend to keep him company soon enough.
151.title: Tall Tails

152.content:
This section is dedicated to beasts that are already large, and usually reptilian. They may be massive daikaiju, petite, scaley girls trying to reach the size of their friends through body fat, or mighty broodmothers, their titanic wombs constantly pregnant, full of many creatures, like an insect queen (Some of these start so small they're human sized, but their bellies quickly swell to mountainous proportions, birthing in massive clutches, though they are still pregnant, even as they finish the labor). The rule here is that you may add an idea, but always remember to leave at least one space for more options.

So, our story follows;




Tecra: A large earth beast. Though humanoid in shape, her brown rock-like plates, lack of pupils, sharp teeth, reptilian features, powerful tail, rippling muscle, and literal tons of body fat make her distinct as she goes about her life, solitary, nonsocial, but not cruel by any stretch. she has somewhat short legs but average arms, and as such will usually walk on all fours. Her personality is like her body; though her exterior is stony and rough, she's softer and warmer on the inside, with a heart of gold (it works in the analogy, since she can digest metal, but it takes awhile, and thus gives her gas. She has recently eaten the hoard of a dragon and all the coins in her make her belly drag across the ground. the hard bony plate covering her skin look out of place when they jiggle on her rotund form. She would do anything for a friend, but she won't admit it.
Neslora is a kirin, and is only about the size of a deer. When Alexander makes it downstairs, he finds the place swarming with guards.
153.content:
Alexander eyed the young man that stood before him, and it was obvious that the weasel was very nervous, if not ready to panic at any given moment. He tucked at his dark grey cloak, trying to conceal himself in the well-lit Inn. His muted orange fur was damp with sweat and his eyes were wide open, darting left and right, as if he was expecting that every costumer that the lion served that evening was out to get him.

Alexander grinned. He knew exactly what this person was. For the last twelve years he owned this Inn, in a small town nestled in the bottom of a valley, he had came in contact with all walks of life: bandits, nobles, soldiers, mercenaries, knights, traitors...He could already identify them by sight.

The weasel was no doubt a thief, and by his behavior told him that he recently stole something very valuable and was expecting someone to come up and slit his throat for it. Not that Alexander minded much, as long as they take there quarrels outside and not make a mess of his establishment. He had, after all, just cleaned the place up after a drunken fight broke out only a few days ago.

"What can I get you, sir?" Alexander asked with his deep voice politely

The weasel was silent for a moment, looking over his shoulder and surveying the room, just to make sure no one was watching him. "I-I would like a room f-for the night," he finally stuttered.

From his pocket he produced a gold coin, placing it on the table, and the lion swiped it away with his big paw. Alexander was no fool. He knew that gold could be faked. He learned that lesson the hard way when he first opened his Inn in his youth. He gave it a nibble with his fangs and was satisfied that it was genuine.

"I guess you'll be taking one of the best rooms for the night?" Alexander said, beaming and raising a bushy eyebrow at him.

The weasel looked over his shoulder a bit more frantically, and it was evident that his paranoia was growing worse by the minute. He, Alexander saw, only wanted to get away from the preying eyes of the other costumers.

"Y-Yeah, sure," he quickly said.

"Want me to bring up some food or ale for you?" Alexander asked casually, like he did with all of his costumers that gave him a gold coin, ignoring the weasel's growing distress.

"No! Please, just a room. That's all," the weasel said, raising his voice a little. His breathing was coming quicker now.

"Alright then," said Alexander, giving his shoulders a shrug.

The lion bent down, opened a drawer, and took one of the many keys that were inside. Like many of his new costumers that wanted to rent a room, Alexander expected that they wouldn't be able to find it without some help.

"Follow me," he said.

The weasel followed him obediently, only glad to be away from the crowd in the main room. After moving down a few gloomy hallways, they made it to the room, the lion plopped the key into the weasel's hand, saying: "Here you go."

He made an attempt to dart inside, but he suddenly stopped. He turned to Alexander and said, "Do you mind if you'll you wake me early?"

The lion scratched his brown mane and said, "Sure. I get up at the crack of dawn. I'll wake you."

With a smile and a quick "thank you", the weasel went inside, slamming the door shut. Alexander only shook his head and went downstairs.

Welcome to Shalion's weight-gain interactive. Here you will find cooperative stories concerning some of the largest characters around. Be forewarned, this type of material may not present itself as explicitly adult, but does cater to a specific audience for whom the content is most assuredly adult. Sexual overtones may appear throughout the interactive.

This is primarily a weight-gain interactive. The stories gathered here cater to people who like to see characters wearing generally heaping helpings of excess body fat. Characters may end up gaining weight or may just start out fat, but generally, the tales here will be concerned with at least one obese individual. There is no set topic, but this interactive is devoted to true literary excellence in this field, which frankly is appallingly lacking in writing talent across the internet. There is no 'fapping' material here. There are real stories with real plot, characters and drama which take place with an eye to this particular kind of aesthetic beauty.

*Edit* After some thought, I have decided to allow general posting to this interactive. Each story slot is marked with the choice "Blank." The first chapter's title should be the title of your story and each availible choice needs to be filled. Character creation is usually a goodt option, but "Something Else" will do if you can't think of anything else to fill the choices.
In order for me to edit the root chapter, I need a short summary of your story to put into the list as well as the title of your story; this you can e-mail to me. Single sentence stories or short intros are subject to deletion; you don't have to use the entire character limit, but I expect quality of what is there. Quantity and Quality are not the same thing, but longer stories do show commitment and an ability to cohesively organize prose. I will ultimately decide whether to include a new story on this interactive. If I ever remove something from the interactive, I will send you an e-mail explaining why I did so. */Edit*

Aside from that, feel free to post in any story which has already been started. But again, chapters will be subject to some scrutiny by myself. Always, I will try to resolve any issues via e-mail. Please leave all options available when you post, to allow others the chance to build on what you wrote.

Lastly, let me place down some ground rules:
1) No prolonged explicit sex scenes (It's alright to say what is happening, but don't center the story around it. Sensuality and implied sex are preferred)

2) No cross fetishes (that means no vorephilia, no unbirthing, etc...)

3) Killing/replacing the main character is fine, but not wantonly (provide a reason)

4) Feel free to be creative, but observe all material which has preceeded your chapter (you mustn't be selective)
